chiwithaya....api kamathi dewal wagema akamathi dewaluth pirunu aruma puduma yathrawak.....api danuwathwa ho nodanuwathwa eeka apiwa gamanak ekkan yanawa...athara magadi ahambayan harima huru purudu deyak bawata pathwenawa....hithe sithuwili ha hagim pawa eka nimeshayakin api wenas pudgalayan bawata path karanawa....samahara ewan siduwim api danuwathwa sidu unath loku dukak ithuru karala yanawa wenna puluwan....samahara ahamben siduwunu sidu wim mulu chiwitha kalayama ho in ehatath ehema nathnam boho kalayak purawata ape hith wachana walin wisthara karanna bari apuru sithuwili walin purawanawa me ee wage sithuwili uparimawa pirila ithirila yana welawaka kenek enna kiyala amathuma denakam balan hitiya awasan winadi kihipaye hadisiye liyawechcha wachana kihipayak kawiyakda nisadasakda wena mokak harida kiyanna nam wadi danumak na...eeth hitha athiwenna puluwan hugak hagim ee kiyanne baya,sathuta,aadaraya,kuthuhalaya,lachchishilithwaya, wage thawa godak hagim pirila ithirila pitara galana welawaka liyawuna kiyanna nam dannawa

manna­rama disthri­kkaye hekta­yara 1400 ka mathsya waga saha karmantha kala­pa­yak ara­mbai­mata da yojana wi thibe.dhiwara rajya amathya dilip weda­aa­rachchi mahatha pawa­sana anda­mata pasu­giya kala­yedi wishala prama­naye issan gowi­pala kuda kotas kara wenath kata­yuthu sadaha dima thaha­nam kiri­ma­tath, karma­nthaya sadaha kapa­wana ayata aadhara saha naya laba­di­ma­tath dhiwara ama­thyanshaya wishala wada kota­sak itu kara atha.
